Aside from that, I have Plague Inc. on my phone but I've only played it a couple of times. It doesn't do it for me because there is a strategy that makes it quite easy, even on the hardest level. I thought I would like it because I really enjoy the board game "Pandemic", but sadly it didn't turn out that way. As far as games for my phone are concerned, Bridge Constructor is probably my favorite. ...But I digress.
